name: Sidebar Menu
author: Hoosoft

sections.description: A sidebar menu allows you to organize information vertically, it is a part of a web page that makes it easy to place navigation or display links to help customers find important information easily. Also, it improves the availability area of the site. When the content on the left side of the page is scrolled, the right sidebar navigation node is activated in association; when the side navigation menu is clicked, the corresponding content on the left side will also be scrolled to the top of the visible area.
sections.installation:
Unzip plugin files and upload them under your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.

Resulted names will be: ‘./wp-content/plugins/sidebar-menu/*’

Activate plugin at “Plugins” administration page.
sections.changelog:

  • Fixed: icon size issue

1.0.3 – 2022-10-29

  • Fixed: Top padding issue
  • Fixed: Responsive Issue

1.0.2 – 2022-10-22

  • Tweak: Added a new style – Side Icon
  • Tweak: Added Sidebar Menu option – Sticky Menu
  • Tweak: Added Sidebar Menu option – Content Before Menu
  • Tweak: Added Sidebar Menu option – Content Before Menu
  • Tweak: Added page option – Fixed Sidebar Menu
  • Tweak: Added page option – Sidebar Menu
  • Tweak: Added page option – Position
  • Tweak: Added page option – Sidebar Menu Width
  • Tweak: Added page option – Height
  • Tweak: Added page option – Top Padding
  • Tweak: Added page option – Left Padding
  • Tweak: Added page option – Right Padding
  • Tweak: Added Sidebar Menu Settings – Sidebar Menu > Settings > Font Awesome Icons

1.0.1 – 2022-10-09

  • Tweak: Added a new style – Animation
